text: Hello all. If I modify a module used in a template, and if a page is already create from this template, this page does not load the module changes. Anyone confirm when we modify a module used in a page, this module on this page is not modify? If yes, what is the best way to modify a module used in a page in order to apply the changes on all pages using this module? Cc <#CFPRTEGTX|modules>
